channel.title: All Things Macintosh
channel.description: A fun look into the apple world. Some info about using your mac and Apple news, predictions, and interviews.
channel.itunes:subtitle: A fun look at the apple world
channel.itunes:author: Jason
channel.itunes:summary: A fun look into the apple world. Some info about using your mac and Apple news, predictions, and interviews.

item.title: Expect New Episodes Next Week!
item.description: I've been pretty lax on updating with the news, I've been so busy I havn't even been able to think about posting episodes. There will be a guarenteed one episode a week, starting next week. Sorry for the inconvenience.

item.title: Saturday, April 22, 2006 All Things Mac News
item.description:
Sorry about taking forever to update, my computer was down.
Questions? Comments?allthingsmacintosh@gmail.com
Or vote for me here: http://www.podcastalley.com/one_vote2.php?pod_id=19014
-As today is earthday, apple announced yesterday that it will recycle you’re old macs for free! when you buy a new one, -The Motoralla Razr 2, is supposed to be even smaller and feature a better camera. Its supposed to ship around 2007 -Steve jobs has supposedly secured iTunes 99 cents a song pricing during talks with record companies. -You can store your data online, and access it for free at www.streamload.com, it’s a good place to back up your data before your computer crashes -If you’ve installed a faulty program, like on windows you can boot into safemode, by holding down the shift key when you start up your mac -Instead of using boot camp, you can use parallels, another product to get windows on your mac.
Interested in advertising? Email me.
Thanks for listening.

Its supposed to ship around 2007 -Steve jobs has supposedly secured iTunes 99 cents a song pricing during talks with record companies. -You can store your data online, and access it for free at www.streamload.com, it’s a good place to back up your data before your computer crashes -If you’ve installed a faulty program, like on windows you can boot into safemode, by holding down the shift key when you start up your mac -Instead of using boot camp, you can use parallels, another product to get windows on your mac.
Interested in advertising? Email me.
Thanks for listening.

item.title: Special Rap Edition for Thursday April 13, 2006
item.description: Today was a special short Rap Edition of All Things Mac. I was just trying to have some fun with it, I hope you enjoy. Email me at applejakg5@gmail.com Vote for me at podcast alley here: http://www.podcastalley.com/podcast_details.php?pod_id=19014 Here are the lyrics: New iBooks renamed Macbooks Are coming to the stores The question is how much to get one out the door They could be in new colors but no ones really sure It doesn’t really matter, it’ll make many really poor Aperture was updated, whats the big deal? Its now a universal binary and that’s for real They lowered the price of it to 300 bucks They also made it better, so now it doesn’t suck MIT Media lab created a new spoon Trust me if you see it, it will make you swoon The spoon will tell you when to stop, before you burn it I can tell you in my house, it should be a big hit This was the second mac rap, I hope its better And I hope you enjoyed it and will send me a letter Thanks for listening!
item.dc:creator: Jason
item.itunes:summary:
Today was a special short Rap Edition of All Things Mac. I was just trying to have some fun with it, I hope you enjoy.
Email me at applejakg5@gmail.com
Vote for me at podcast alley here: http://www.podcastalley.com/podcast_details.php?pod_id=19014
Here are the lyrics: New iBooks renamed Macbooks Are coming to the stores The question is how much to get one out the door
They could be in new colors but no ones really sure It doesn’t really matter, it’ll make many really poor
Aperture was updated, whats the big deal? Its now a universal binary and that’s for real
They lowered the price of it to 300 bucks They also made it better, so now it doesn’t suck
MIT Media lab created a new spoon Trust me if you see it, it will make you swoon
The spoon will tell you when to stop, before you burn it I can tell you in my house, it should be a big hit
This was the second mac rap, I hope its better And I hope you enjoyed it and will send me a letter
Thanks for listening!

item.title: Special Rap Edition for Thursday March 9, 2006
item.description:
Today was a special Mac Edition of All Things Mac. I was just trying to have some fun with it, I hope you enjoy.
Email me at applejakg5@gmail.com
Vote for me at podcast alley here: http://www.podcastalley.com/podcast_details.php?pod_id=19014
You can talk about the show here: http://allthingsmac.forumco.com
Check out Posing for Pennies at: www.myspace.com/posingforpennies
Here are the lyrics for the rap: John Stewarts on the ipod, whats new about it sucker? Apple made it cheaper that’s what mother –
Drop ten bucks for a few shows its not a bad deal Unless you’re living on the streets and cant even afford a meal
You can buy the shows individually, but who would do that? You can save 20 bucks a month, now that’s what I call that “phat”
Moving on to the next topic its on something cool Its on cracking the mac and if youre a big fool
The newspapers report it, its just what they do The mac cant be cracked and they don’t lie too
A few people have tried hacking and it didn’t work out I guess all they can do is sit around and pout
University of Wisconsin Madison tried hacking, to no avail I guess we can all sit comfortable as macs prevail
This ends the mac rap, I hope it sounds great I’m just trying this out, I don’t think rappings my fate
Thanks for listening!

You could also email me at applejakg5@gmail.com if you have anything to say.
